20 April 2013

Git password no more

Ridiculous simple, let´s go:

$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your-email@teste.com"
$ cd ~/.ssh
$ ls -al (this will list files id_rsa and id_rsa.pub)

The file id_rsa are your private-key keep it with you soul :) The file id_rsa.pub are you public-key this file you put on https://github.com/settings/ssh

$ pbcopy < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

After clik “Add SSH key” - CMD+V - SAVE Testing

$ ssh -T git@github.com
